channel.title: bloodline-specific items.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "bloodline-specific items." - e.g. eye drops etc.

item.title: bloodline-specific items.
item.content:encoded:
what are bloodline specific items that you get from having theme's like 'you see right through me' or 'flash' do? it says they are consumables but what for?

i've got the red-eye sannin theme and want to know what the benifit of using it is.
